plot: An alien lands on earth, and decides that he needs to take a job in order to raise money to build a spaceship so he can get back to his home planet.
title: The Man Who Fell to Earth
plot_es: An alien lands on earth, and decides that he needs to take a job in order to raise money to build a spaceship so he can get back to his home planet.
original_name: The Man Who Fell to Earth
plot_en: An alien lands on earth, and decides that he needs to take a job in order to raise money to build a spaceship so he can get back to his home planet.
